title: Guns N' Roses - Paradise City (Official Music Video)

meta.description:
Official Music Video for "Paradise City" performed by Guns N' Roses from their debut album, 'Appetite for Destruction.' Featured in Thor: Love and Thunder. 

#AppetiteForDestruction: The Debut Album, Remastered and Expanded. Available now as Box Set, Super Deluxe, Double LP, and Double CD here: https://lnk.to/AppetiteForDestructionYD/gnrstore 

Apple Music: https://lnk.to/AppetiteForDestructionYD/applemusic 
iTunes: https://lnk.to/AppetiteForDestructionYD/itunes 
Spotify: https://lnk.to/AppetiteForDestructionYD/spotify 
Amazon: https://lnk.to/AppetiteForDestructionYD/amazon 
Google Play: https://lnk.to/AppetiteForDestructionYD/google-play 

Subscribe to Guns N' Roses YouTube channel and never miss an update: https://GNR.lnk.to/YouTube

Watch more Guns N' Roses official music videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOTK54q5K4INNXaHKtmXYr6J7CajWjqeJ

Follow Guns N' Roses:
Site: https://www.gunsnroses.com/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gunsnroses 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gunsnroses 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gunsnroses 

Music video by Guns N' Roses performing Paradise City. YouTube view counts pre-VEVO: 3,424,935. (C) 1988 Guns N' Roses under exclusive license to Geffen Records

comments.text: I was There In Space Alien 3000
comments.author: yakuzasugoideskafandude

comments.text: Music acts like a magic key, to which the most tightly closed heart opens.🥰
comments.author: classicrockplaylist01

comments.text: At his very best, Axl had THE best voice in rock. Better than Freddie, Robert Plant.
comments.author: 1markdun

comments.text: Non c'è nessuna città paradisiaca a questo Mondo.Che le ragazze siano carine non sarebbe un significato ma un significante.Diciamolo pure con un rock granitico:nessun predicatore ci ha mai parlato del Paradiso nei dettagli.Non ci parlano dell'Ignoto questi predicatori che predicherebbero un Regno di un altro Mondo.
comments.author: stefanotosi8160

comments.text:
... yeah, please, go home.

This band was a milestone of embarressment for every all-times.
It´s still sounding like a «wannabe like Van Halen» since about 30 years, 
without nothing grew up of it until today.

I am proud somehow, that I have never payed any Cent for the Music of this band.
comments.author: borderich774

comments.text: I wasn't a fan but you will never see another band like this again
comments.author: ih8hertz1
